column4: Hi, i've made a unetbootin usb stick and it didn't work. Anyone know why?
Hi, i've made a unetbootin usb stick and it didn't work. Anyone know why?
can you be more specific?  is your BIOS just bypassing the device during boot, or are you getting an error when trying to boot to it?
you gotta make sure that your BIOS can boot from usb, and you gotta make the usb stick bootable
